what: hercpanorama: Wrangle data from the Panorama Student Information System — hercpanorama-package
title: hercpanorama: Wrangle data from the Panorama Student Information System — hercpanorama-package
text: Student-level data Panoram export wide-formatted csv files. file common identifying demographic data, many, possibly unique, columns corresponding scores assessments responses surveys. names columns include information type data collected well data collected. also usually two columns every assessment, raw score grade.

title: hercpanorama: Wrangle data from the Panorama Student Information System — hercpanorama-package
text: Maintainer: Ben Taft ben.taft@career2cradle.org contributors: Higher Expectations Racine County [copyright holder]
